item.title: South Korean parliament votes to lift martial law following president's declaration
item.description: President Yoon Suk Yeol of South Korea declared martial law late Tuesday.

item.title: Secret Service fires shots near Janet Yellen's home, no one hurt
item.description: A U.S. Secret Service agent fired shots near the home of Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen early Tuesday morning.
